metadata.title: NORTY Thong Flip Flops for Women - Footwear for Summer - Comfortable Sandals - Women's Flip Flops - Runs One Size Small
features: EASY TO WEAR FLIP FLOPS: These comfortable women's sandals easily slip on and kick off again for an anywhere, anytime kind of style. They are perfect for taking a quick step outside, a full day at the beach, and everything in between.

EVERYDAY CASUAL: Wear these flip-flops to the beach, pool, or around the house, or pair them with your favorite sundress for a day out and about. They are made for all-day comfort wherever you take them.
FLEXIBLE AND COMFORTABLE: Padded straps with a soft fabric toe divider are easy on the feet, and a spongy footbed with a slight wedge heel makes these sandals a go-to for comfort and durability.
30-DAY GUARANTEE: There's no need to guess if they'll fit. If these sandals don't meet your expectations after 30 days, simply return them unworn for a no questions asked refund.

NORTY: Founded in 1947, we are a 4th generation family business dedicated to bringing you the most desired styles at the best possible pricing. Norty takes pride in our products created through in-house design and extensive sourcing capabilities.
description: Norty - Women's Flip Flop Thong Sandal, Slip on this fashion forward sandal and you are set for the day, Fabric straps in ombre or faux leather, Platform is approximately 3/4 inch high, Cushioned rubber footbed, non skid soutsole, Mand made materials, Made in China, #40692
